::firestorm was just sitting on a rock when all of a sudden a blue 
light surrounded him::

Firestorm-Huh,whats going on

::he is beamed out of earth and on to SageStar the cruiser for the 
Sage Squad:::

Voice-You have been selected

Firestorm-for what and who are you

Voice-You are to be a Sage,a protector of realms,I have been keeping 
an eye on the Gurdians that have been on earth and I have decided to 
bring more power unto them,i shall not reveal that at this time

Firestorm-and how shall you accomplish this?

Voice-The time for questions is over,you will have one of our bots go 
with you back to Earth,now go

::the blue light reappears and Firestorm finds himself in a sleep 
like stage and unknown to him he is being changed as he goes through 
space with a new ally back to earth:::
